xwikidoc.name: ResourceDeletedEmail
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content:
From: filecheck@curriki.org To: $email Subject: Curriki Resource Deleted - $assettitle
Dear Curriki Member $membername,
You added or created a learning resource, $assettitle, into the Curriki repository.
Curriki's goal is to serve as a platform for the global education community to freely distribute world-class educational materials to anyone who needs them.
Your resource was without educational value or did not meet the stated purposes of the site as expressed in the Terms of Use, so it has been deleted from the repository.
If you would like more information regarding Curriki's content screening process, or if you would like to discuss this particular submission, please email filecheck@curriki.org.
